title: Disconnect Losses
body:
I recently played my first placement game of the season. During that game my internet crashed. I restarted my router and was back in the game within 3 or 4 minutes. After 2 minutes my team won the game without me dealing a single damage up to that point. 
The game was rated for me as a loss, even though i reconnected and noone issued a report.
The reason for this is, that a game, that you disconnect from for more than 90 secs is automatically rated a loss, due to riot support.

In my opinion this system is not fair for those, who really have a disconnect.
Shouldn't the afk penelty system be at least take into account both, time off and reports?
That way it would be assured, that only ragequitters and leavers are hit.

replies.body: You Just gotta Take that one loss, it aint that big a deal

u dont know if u were reported or not.
either way that afk system triggers without needing a report. i have dc sometimes too and sometimes i have to restart computer for reconnecting but well riot rules states that we have to keep our hardware in a state we can play ourself so in that way we cant complain. but it would be nice if the timer would allow a longer timeout from the game. when u realize u need a restart of the pc that countdown is really small and u most likely get an afk.
